title: Stalker22
author: Stalker22
content: Binance is announcing an exclusive, multi-year NFT partnership with Portuguese footballing legend Cristiano Ronaldo. Through this partnership, Binance will launch a global promotion aiming to give Ronaldo’s fans an introduction to Web3 with a compelling entry point into the world of NFTs.Over the course of the agreement, Binance and Cristiano Ronaldo will create a series of NFT collections for sale exclusively on the Binance NFT platform. The first NFT collection will be released later this year and feature designs created in collaboration with Ronaldo.The Cristiano Ronaldo NFT collections will be available exclusively on Binance NFT at www.binance.com/en/nft/home.Source: https://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement/c91e9b1c1492456f9909e16f2ff3427ehttps://twitter.com/binance/status/1539969367726620674

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Binance do spent a lot money here since Cristiano Ronaldo is a GOAT in football and many people who don't want watch football also know who he is. I think the NFT price would be skyrocket since there's a lot Cristiano Ronaldo fans out there, however it's just a hype and then it's will become worthless.

comments.author: kaseygriffin
comments.body: There will be new hype following this news, and I really can't imagine what they will do with it. It is possible that we are seeing the cooling of NFT in the past few months, and this may be a way for Binance to prepare for a new monetization scheme from users and investors. However, this is great news because it shows the cooperation between the parties. This is one of my favorite rock stars.

comments.author: LodisMcguire
comments.body: You know what happen with project partnered with famous people without crypto knowledge background? It died pretty fast and short lived.With big name like binance,maybe it will create a hype for like a month and people will forget it then lose it value.You know,like the ''first tweet'' case.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: According to reports, Binance will launch its first NFT collection in late 2022, and it will feature designs created in collaboration with Ronaldo himself. All NFT collections will be available exclusively on Binance's NFT store.It's interesting to note that Ronaldo is the most followed person on Instagram, having 459 million followers. He has more followers than the population of the entire United States. So I guess that's somewhat good for crypto adoption, at least people will have to learn something.It is ironic that Binance CEO Changpeng posted a week ago that the company had passed on expensive sponsorships allowing them to keep on hiring more employees during the crypto bear market. This is almost like him contradicting himself.

comments.author: FrozenBit
comments.body: I am not too surprised to see this as Binance is increasing their influence in this market as well as in other areas, and this time we see a partnership with CR7. But honestly, I'm still looking forward to other positive signals surrounding the NFT trend, not to popularize it but to show people what it will bring, after all the hype is over. Everyone sees a lot of junk products, but the market giants have yet to prove different with what they offer.

comments.author: Lagduf
comments.body: CR7 is a very good choice by binance. I know that if binance must have paid him a lot but that's worth with how many followers on his instagram. he can be considered as a guy with so many followers after instagram itself. Multi year partnership will give so many impact to the binance. Im sure that this will be boosting binance. This time binance has multi millions users around the world and i think that will increase drastically. Remember that this partnership is also about NFT

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on June 23, 2022, 10:06:18 PM...Over the course of the agreement, Binance and Cristiano Ronaldo will create a series of NFT collections for sale exclusively on the Binance NFT platform. The first NFT collection will be released later this year and feature designs created in collaboration with Ronaldo.The Cristiano Ronaldo NFT collections will be available exclusively on Binance NFT at www.binance.com/en/nft/home...Given the fact that the number of Cristiano Ronaldo Twitter followers is more than 100 million, these NFT will have to be in high demand. And Cristiano Ronaldo has already posted a corresponding tweet for his fans: https://twitter.com/Cristiano/status/1539972040291061765 Binance, for its part, will definitely increase the number of users who were not previously familiar with the crypto currency.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on June 24, 2022, 02:19:44 PM-snipAt least "Binance" got a nice shills ~XDBut remember guys, I have some project and experience in sale NFTs from Binance. You're not gonna get a chance to buy the collection, bot sniping is always on there under 1 second sold out. No matter any project, shit or not the bot is sniping collection to resell high,

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on June 24, 2022, 08:25:13 AMBinance do spent a lot money here since Cristiano Ronaldo is a GOAT in football and many people who don't want watch football also know who he is. I think the NFT price would be skyrocket since there's a lot Cristiano Ronaldo fans out there, however it's just a hype and then it's will become worthless.There's no guarantee for that but they might be a temporary increase of price for those NFT attributed to CR7 itself and not the general NFT price. Binancedone this before with different football star but the result is not that much a big impact. I know CR7 and I’m a fan of him but I will definitely don't  buy an NFT right now since the marketis very bad. No one will buy a useless NFT right now unless you are a collector only. Investors are giving importance to cheap crypto rather than fancy NFT on this crypto bloodbath.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: Hmm pretty interesting case happened with binance. Ronaldo already announced the partnership with binance. just curious how many millions USD being paid for him. Let's see how effective this effort by binance but im sure that if this is related with the NFT. binance is trying to take NFT into the next level of adoptions. It seems like so many NFT related projects were facing a small surge caused by this news, I hope that another big news will come from the development and adoption for NFT as well. I hope that massive adoption for NFT will happen very soon.

comments.author: Morningstarr
comments.body: Cristiano Ronaldo is a celebrity who has fans in every corner of the globe. There are still a lot of people who don't know much about digital currency, especially NFT, especially in countries like Pakistan.  It will be much easier to convey the message of this new technology to many people.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: Maybe just a tad bit too late? I mean don't get me wrong there will be a billion fans out there who will be standing outside trying to get a feeling out of any of this. But, that doesn't change the fact that I would not be doing this just for the money, probably never for the money.After all of that first initial hype is gone, and the "it's ronaldo nft!!" people already bought it, then we are going to have a calm period where it will probably not worth as much as it did initially. Plus if they did this like a year ago for example, it would have collected at least twice as much as they could now, still a lot of money today, but not nearly as much as it could have been.Ronaldo is a guy that sold like 100+ million dollars in jersey sales last year alone, if you could get his jerseys sold that much, then I am sure that his NFT would probably get sold a lot as well. This is why it is going to be fine for now, but not a great idea in the long run.

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: You may remember that just shifting a bottle of Ronaldo brand can make the price in the market drop very drastically. And now that he's tweeting with Binance to collaborate on launching NFT it's definitely going to be hype. I'm not sure this will be a cheap price to buy and if Binance is the platform then it's possible the promotion will go well.

comments.author: Tomohisa
comments.body: Not a good move, Binance. If Binance can afford that kind of money paying a renowned figure who doesn't have anything to do with crypto, shill NFTs which also didn't really popular among crypto community. Then they're really desperate and want the money from people who know nothing about NTF at all. This is a recipe for disasters in the future.

comments.author: tomahawk9
comments.body: Quote from: LodisMcguire on June 24, 2022, 08:51:33 AMWith big name like binance,maybe it will create a hype for like a month and people will forget it then lose it value.You know,like the ''first tweet'' case.They have to go for the short-term. Surely they know the NFT hype is running out of steam fast due to the bad press it keeps getting, plus, the recent crypto crash doesn't help either. But, still, even if the NFT thing doesn't go as planned, it's not a bad investment to have one of the most popular football players to shill for your product. If Binance can get at least 2% of Ronaldo's IG followers to open a binance acc, 9mill users, and at least retain 10% of those new users, that would be a massive success for Binance.

comments.author: MarcoReus11
comments.body: Cristiano Ronaldo is now Ambassador of the world's best cryptocurrency Exchange "Binance". It is pretty good for "CZ" to Attract the Global people & gain more fame through partnerships with celebrities.Official Binance claimed that they are set to collaborate with "Cristiano Ronaldo" to create their NFT series for exclusive sale on Binance NFT Marketplace.I am not sure about that but some rumors that are this CR7 NFT series will be released this year soon. But I am so excited about this idea of the humble "CZ" would change NFT MarketPlace as well as Crypto.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Quote from: LodisMcguire on June 24, 2022, 08:51:33 AMYou know what happen with project partnered with famous people without crypto knowledge background? It died pretty fast and short lived.With big name like binance,maybe it will create a hype for like a month and people will forget it then lose it value.You know,like the ''first tweet'' case.Gaining more awareness and getting user acquisition is their major point.It would be too naive that their strategy would only be narrowing toward an NFT as it is. Do note that, Ronaldo's publicity is enormous and if we look at Binance competitor some of them got troubled in regard of bankruptcy issues. So, NFT is not merely the point.

comments.author: Joca97
comments.body: I think it was just a matter of time when Cristiano Ronaldo was gonna go into NFTs and i think we can expect a lot more players to join in the future. Lionel Messi already joined NFTs last year and has his own colection. Hopefully this news have positive effects on the NFT world

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on June 24, 2022, 03:53:45 PMQuote from: Plaguedeath on June 24, 2022, 08:25:13 AMBinance do spent a lot money here since Cristiano Ronaldo is a GOAT in football and many people who don't want watch football also know who he is. I think the NFT price would be skyrocket since there's a lot Cristiano Ronaldo fans out there, however it's just a hype and then it's will become worthless.There's no guarantee for that but they might be a temporary increase of price for those NFT attributed to CR7 itself and not the general NFT price. Binancedone this before with different football star but the result is not that much a big impact. I know CR7 and I’m a fan of him but I will definitely don't  buy an NFT right now since the marketis very bad. No one will buy a useless NFT right now unless you are a collector only. Investors are giving importance to cheap crypto rather than fancy NFT on this crypto bloodbath.At least the football mega star partnership (Ronaldo) has a good impact, although for the exclusives on offer, surely this is only a collector and I don't know how high the price for NFT is, will it be more expensive than expected?Well of course there will be hype considering Ronaldo has the most fans, and Binance is already planning on marketing its NFT.
